channel.title: [REQ] Thieving script - Ardouge Upstairs Chests
channel.description:
I'd like a script that thieves from the two chests in an upstairs part of a house in Ardouge. There are two chests - one with a Nature Rune and 30 GP, the other with 50 GP. Both chests have traps.
So could someone makes a script that:
- uses antirandom stuff (running from gas that might come out of the chests) - will move onto the second chest once the first has been looted - will disarm the chest's traps BEFORE it opens them - will say things or dance every now and then to avoid suspicion
Please? Thanks! :D

item.title: [REQ] Thieving script - Ardouge Upstairs Chests
item.dc:creator: @Marik Marik
item.description:
@Marik wrote:

I’d like a script that thieves from the two chests in an upstairs part of a house in Ardouge. There are two chests - one with a Nature Rune and 30 GP, the other with 50 GP. Both chests have traps.

So could someone makes a script that:

  • uses antirandom stuff (running from gas that might come out of the chests)
  • will move onto the second chest once the first has been looted
  • will disarm the chest’s traps BEFORE it opens them
  • will say things or dance every now and then to avoid suspicion

Please? Thanks!
